verses.verse: And as they approached <S%G1448><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> at Bethphage <S%G967><s%> and Bethany, <S%G963><s%> near <S%G4314><s%> the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> He sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G5217><s%> into the village <S%G2968><s%> opposite <S%G2713><s%> you, and immediately <S%G2117><s%> as you enter <S%G1531><s%> it, you will find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> [there,] on which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G444><s%> <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3768><s%> has ever <S%G3768><s%> sat; <S%G2523><s%> untie <S%G3089><s%> it and bring <S%G5342><s%> it [here.]

"And if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'Why <S%G5101><s%> are you doing <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>?' you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of it'; and immediately <S%G2117><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> it back <S%G3825><s%> here. <S%G5602><s%>"

And they went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> at the door <S%G2374><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> in the street; <S%G296><s%> and they untied <S%G3089><s%> it.
And some <S%G5100><s%> of the bystanders <S%G1563><s%> <S%G2476><s%> were saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G5101><s%> are you doing, <S%G4160><s%> untying <S%G3089><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%>?"
And they spoke <S%G3004><s%> to them just <S%G2531><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had told <S%G3004><s%> [them,] and they gave <S%G863><s%> them permission. <S%G863><s%>
And they brought <S%G5342><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and put <S%G1911><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> on it; and He sat <S%G2523><s%> upon it.

And many <S%G4183><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> in the road, <S%G3598><s%> and others <S%G243><s%> [spread] leafy <S%G4742><s%> branches <S%G4742><s%> which they had cut <S%G2875><s%> from the fields. <S%G68><s%>

And those <S%G3588><s%> who went <S%G4254><s%> before, <S%G4254><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who followed <S%G190><s%> after, were crying <S%G2896><s%> out, "Hosanna! <S%G5614><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is He who comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
Blessed <S%G2127><s%> [is] the coming <S%G2064><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our father <S%G3962><s%> David; <S%G7035><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in the highest! <S%G5310><s%>"

And He entered <S%G1525><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> [and came] into the temple; <S%G2413><s%> and after looking <S%G4017><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> around, <S%G4017><s%> He departed <S%G1831><s%> for Bethany <S%G963><s%> with the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> since it was already <S%G2235><s%> late. <S%G3796><s%>
And on the next <S%G1887><s%> day, <S%G1887><s%> when they had departed <S%G1831><s%> from Bethany, <S%G963><s%> He became hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

And seeing <S%G3708><s%> at a distance <S%G3113><s%> a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> in leaf, <S%G5444><s%> He went <S%G2064><s%> [to see] if <S%G1487><s%> perhaps <S%G686><s%> He would find <S%G2147><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> on it; and when He came <S%G2064><s%> to it, He found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> but leaves, <S%G5444><s%> for it was not the season <S%G2540><s%> for figs. <S%G4810><s%>

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to it, "May no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> ever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> from you again! <S%G3371><s%>" And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> were listening. <S%G191><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%> And He entered <S%G1525><s%> the temple <S%G2413><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> out those <S%G3588><s%> who were buying <S%G59><s%> and selling <S%G4453><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and overturned <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the moneychangers <S%G2855><s%> and the seats <S%G2515><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were selling <S%G4453><s%> doves; <S%G4058><s%>
and He would not permit <S%G863><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> to carry <S%G1308><s%> goods <S%G4632><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the temple. <S%G2413><s%>

And He [began] to teach <S%G1321><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Is it not written, <S%G1125><s%> 'My house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>'? But you have made <S%G4160><s%> it a robbers' den. <S%G4693><s%>"

And the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [this], and [began] seeking <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> Him; for they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> of Him, for all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> was astonished <S%G1605><s%> at His teaching. <S%G1322><s%>
And whenever <S%G3752><s%> evening <S%G3796><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> they would go <S%G1607><s%> out of the city. <S%G4172><s%>
And as they were passing <S%G3899><s%> by in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> they saw <S%G3708><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> withered <S%G3583><s%> from the roots <S%G4491><s%> [up.]

And being reminded, <S%G363><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> You cursed <S%G2672><s%> has withered. <S%G3583><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Have <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> 'Be taken <S%G142><s%> up and cast <S%G906><s%> into the sea, <S%G2281><s%>' and does not doubt <S%G1252><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> but believes <S%G4100><s%> that what <S%G3739><s%> he says <S%G2980><s%> is going to happen, <S%G1096><s%> it shall be [granted] him.

"Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> for which <S%G3745><s%> you pray <S%G4336><s%> and ask, <S%G154><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> that you have received <S%G2983><s%> them, and they shall be [granted] you.

"And whenever <S%G3752><s%> you stand <S%G4739><s%> praying, <S%G4336><s%> forgive, <S%G863><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> anyone; <S%G5100><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that your Father <S%G3962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> may forgive <S%G863><s%> you your transgressions. <S%G3900><s%>

["But if <S%G1487><s%> you do not forgive, <S%G863><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will your Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> your transgressions. <S%G3900><s%>"]

And they came <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%> And as He was walking <S%G4043><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and elders <S%G4245><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Him,

and [began] saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "By what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> are You doing <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> You this <S%G3778><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I will ask <S%G1905><s%> you one <S%G1520><s%> question, <S%G3056><s%> and you answer <S%G611><s%> Me, and [then] I will tell <S%G3004><s%> you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>
"Was the baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> from men <S%G444><s%>? Answer <S%G611><s%> Me."

And they [began] reasoning <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> we say, <S%G3004><s%> 'From heaven, <S%G3772><s%>' He will say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Then <S%G3767><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not believe <S%G4100><s%> him?'

"But shall we say, <S%G3004><s%> 'From men <S%G444><s%>'?" â€“ they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> of the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> for all <S%G537><s%> considered <S%G2192><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> to have been <S%G1510><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%> indeed. <S%G3689><s%>

And answering <S%G611><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> "We do not know. <S%G3609><s%>" And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Neither <S%G3761><s%> will I tell <S%G3004><s%> you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>"
